meanings.definition: To infuse with spirit or life
meanings.sent1: The kind words of his friend inspirits him to keep going.
meanings.sent2: The beautiful music inspirits the audience, filling them with joy.
meanings.sent3: The magical potion inspirits the old tree, making it grow leaves again.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise inspirits the sleepy town, bringing it to life with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The coach's pep talk inspirits the team, motivating them to give their best.

meanings.definition: To fill with high spirits or enthusiasm
meanings.sent1: The surprise party inspirits her, making her smile from ear to ear.
meanings.sent2: The victory in the game inspirits the players, boosting their morale.
meanings.sent3: The delicious aroma of the bakery inspirits the whole neighborhood, drawing them in.
meanings.sent4: The success of the project inspirits the team, propelling them towards more achievements.
meanings.sent5: The upcoming holiday inspirits the children, filling them with excitement and anticipation.
